user_request: Clear the cart on walmart. Add usb-b to the cart on walmart
screen_desc: The screenshot shows a Walmart mobile shopping page displaying a product listing. It features a Monoprice USB Type-A to USB Type-B cable (6 feet, black, 5-pack) priced at $44.99, along with its product rating (167 reviews) and an option for 3+ day shipping. The "Add" button allows adding the product to the shopping cart. Below, there is a promotion for the Walmart app.
